entity.name: The White House
entity.description: Conversation from and about the White House, both as a destination and as political voice

text: @Surgeon_General @WhiteHouse Okay, tobacco, alcohol and drugs are the reason why trump downplayed the coronavirus and held many rallies. His perfect strategy gave us little time to prepare but okay, I see where you’re  getting.
